name: Keen Clearwater CNX Sandals - Women's
description: Let your feet move naturally. Enjoy almost-minimalist sandals without sacrificing fit and protection. The CNX series deliver Keen™ performance in a slim, lightweight package, and all-synthetic construction makes the Clearwater equally at home on land or in water.Uppers are made of washable polyester webbing.Bungee quick-lace system.4mm midsole-drop positions feet in a natural stance.Midsoles are a lightweight PU compound that delivers longer lasting support, protection, and comfort than EVA foam, and with less bulk.Metatarsal ridges for natural underfoot support.TPU shanks for stability.Non-marking carbon rubber outsoles have lugs with sipes (small slits) for traction on trails and slippery smooth surfaces.
